cleaned_text: Rite Aid Multi-Symptom Nasal Allergy Spray - 0.57 fl oz Item No. 0368596 Rite Aid Multi-Symptom Nasal Allergy Spray, Original Prescription Strength, offers 120 sprays for 24 hour relief of nasal congestion, sneezing, and runny and itchy nose. - Compare to the active ingredient in Nasacort Allergy 24 Hour. - This item may be eligible for FSA and HSA reimbursement. For any questions you may have regarding FSAs or HSAs, please browse our [FAQ.](https://www.riteaid.com/faq/fsa-hsa-eligible) (Inside Package) on how toGet a new bottle ready (primed) before first use, prime bottle again if not used for more than two weeks, use the spray and clean the spray nozzle. Active Ingredient(In pH adjustment), microcrystalline cellulose, polysorbate 80, purified water.
